name: Virtually Super Hydlide Special
description:
Part of a One-Game-A-Month Challenge from almost a decade ago, I'd tried to use the assets and gameplay of Hydlide to create a fully 3D rendition of the game.

Three magic gems protected the Land of Fairy Land. But an evil man stole the jewels and freed the demon king, Boralis. Boralis cursed the queen and released monsters across the land.

Take on the role of the knight Jim as he gathers the fairies, recovers the gems, and rescues princess Anne.

Controls:

-Arrows to move

-Left control to attack

-Left Alt to Cast Magic

- Spacebar to open your level up menu
